# API Reference

This page contains a table with API endpoints.

## Endpoints

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| GET | /api/users | List all users |
| POST | /api/users | Create a new user |
| DELETE | /api/users/:id | Delete a user |

## Status Codes

| Code | Meaning |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Success |
| 404 | Not Found |
| 500 | Server Error |
